item.source: How do i made a Donator Icon

item.title: How do i made a Donator Icon
item.dc:creator: @Spill Spill
item.description:
@Spill wrote:

I think i know

First of all open up client.java

and search for

        playerIsMember = 1;

change that 1 to a 0

Ok now for shouting (::yell)

reopen client.java

search for

if (command.startsWith("yell"

When youve founf replace with this

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { String titles = ""; if (playerRights == 0 && playerIsMember == 0) { titles = "[Player] "; } else if (playerRights == 0 && playerIsMember == 1) { titles = "[Premium] "; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[Moderator] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[Admin] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[Co-Owner] "; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("*owner name*")) { titles = "[>>[OWNER]<<]-"; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("*coder name*")) { titles = "[>>[CODER]<<]-"; } yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }

Thats adding coder owner and premium (up the top)

if you already see your yell command their do this
replace this

String titles = ""; if (playerRights == 0) { titles = "[Player] ";

with this

String titles = ""; if (playerRights == 0 && playerIsMember == 0) { titles = "[Player] "; } else if (playerRights == 0 && playerIsMember == 1) { titles = "[Premium] "; }

What this does is when some yells this

::yell Hi there my username is john (and they are premium)

it will say this

[Premium] John: Hi there my username is john

Assuming their username is john

Now to get the dollar sign, (ive never done before)
you would have to get the sprite and save it as whatever in your sprites folder and then just like add what that sprite is called to that last code

Read full topic

item.title: How do i made a Donator Icon
item.dc:creator: @Spill Spill
item.description:
@Spill wrote:

Sounds like your server doesnt have the “Dollar sign” sprite, you’ll need to get that sprite somehow and program it into your server.

Yet it may not be this complicated, search your rank files to see if theres already donator programmed into it
for example

1 = donator
2 = mod
3 = admin
4 = hidden admin

I’m not sure it might be similar, could be 0 or some other number

Read full topic
